question: Which among the following dynasties is known to have given the largest grant of villages to the temples and Brahamans?
explanation: Guptas have given the largest grant of villages to the temples and Brahamans. Land grants given to religious institutions were called Brahmadeya, (i.e. donated to Brahmins) , Devadana (donated to Gods) and Agrahara (Settlement â€“ of priests).
